data.title: Premier Market Research Facility
data.meta_description: A premier focus group facility, Sago Dallas offers spacious and secure research suites with contemporary interiors.
data.text:
Directions to Sago Dallas

Schlesinger Dallas is now Sago Dallas

International Plaza 3

14241 Dallas Pkwy, Suite 500

Dallas, TX 75254

+1 (972) 503-3100

Sago Dallas is located at 14241 Dallas Parkway, in the International Plaza, a 3-building office complex on the west side of Dallas Parkway at International Parkway. Our office is in Suite 500 of Building III, a 13-story building that faces south.

As you turn from Dallas Parkway onto International Parkway, our building is on your right and is the building closest to the pond.

Free parking is available in the north parking garage on the west side of the complex, behind Building II.

Look for the entrance to Building III at the north end of the garage, opposite the garage entrance.

FROM DFW AIRPORT

Exit DFW Airport via the North exit. Follow signs to I-635 East to Dallas; I-635 is also known as LBJ Freeway.

Continue East for 15 miles. You’ll pass a major intersection with I-35, also known as Stemmons Freeway; continue East on I-635, passing exits for Josey Lane, Marsh Lane, and Midway Road.

Take exit #22D for Dallas Parkway, turn left at the second light at the top of the overpass, and go North on Dallas Parkway, which is the service road for Dallas Tollway.

Continue North on Dallas Parkway, passing the Dallas Galleria and the Westin Hotel, the intersection with Alpha Road and then the intersection with Spring Valley Road.

The next intersection is Quorum Drive (to the left) / Verde Valley (to the right). Turn left onto Quorum Drive and then take an immediate left onto southbound Dallas Parkway so that you have made a U-turn on Dallas Parkway.

Continue south ½ mile to International Plaza, which will be on your right.

Turn right onto International Parkway. Continue past the buildings to the north parking garage, which will be on your right, just after you pass Building II.

FROM DALLAS LOVE AIRPORT

Exit the airport and turn left onto Mockingbird Lane, heading East.

Continue East 1.5 miles on Mockingbird Lane and turn left onto Dallas Tollway.

Enter the Tollway, heading north.

Continue North on Dallas Tollway for 8 miles; you’ll pass the major intersection with I-635, followed by the Dallas Galleria and Westin Hotel, which will be on your right.

Take the Spring Valley Road/Quorum Drive exit.

Continue North, past the intersection with Spring Valley Road. You’ll be on Dallas Parkway, which is the service road for Dallas Tollway.

The next intersection is Quorum Drive (to the left) / Verde Valley (to the right). Turn left onto Quorum Drive and then take an immediate left onto Southbound Dallas Parkway so that you have made a U-turn on Dallas Parkway.

Continue south ½ mile to International Plaza, which will be on your right.

Turn right onto International Parkway. Continue past the buildings to the north parking garage, which will be on your right, just after you pass Building II.

Local Driving Directions

FROM THE NORTH

Go South on Dallas Parkway, and continue south past Belt Line Road and Quorum Drive.

Turn right onto International Parkway, which is 0.1 mile north of Spring Valley. Our building will be on the right and is the building closest to the pond.

Continue West on International Parkway, passing the office buildings, to the North parking garage, which will be on your right, just after you pass Building II.

FROM THE SOUTH

Go North on Dallas Tollway, passing the major intersection with I-635, followed by the Dallas Galleria and Westin Hotel, which will be on your right.

Take the Spring Valley Road/Quorum Drive exit.

Continue North, past the intersection with Spring Valley Road. You’ll be on Dallas Parkway, which is the service road for Dallas Tollway.

The next intersection is Quorum Drive (to the left) / Verde Valley (to the right). Turn left onto Quorum Drive and then take an immediate left onto Southbound Dallas Parkway, so that you have made a U-turn on Dallas Parkway.

Continue South ½ mile to International Plaza, which will be on your right.

Turn right onto International Parkway, which is 0.1 mile north of Spring Valley. Our building will be on the right and is the building closest to the pond.

Continue west on International Parkway past the buildings to the North parking garage, which will be on your right, just after you pass Building II.

ALTERNATE NORTH OR SOUTH ROUTE

Go North or South on Inwood Road to International Parkway, which is 0.1 mile North of Spring Valley Road and is across from the Cort Furniture Rental store with a red awning.

Turn onto International Parkway and head east, toward Dallas Parkway / Tollway.

Turn left into the North parking garage, which is on the west side of the International Plaza buildings. The entrance to the garage is just before the skybridge that connects two buildings.

FROM THE EAST OR WEST

Take Spring Valley Road to Inwood Road and turn North onto Inwood.

Turn right onto International Parkway, which is 0.1 mile north of Spring Valley Road and is across from the Cort Furniture Rental store with the red awning.

Turn onto International Parkway and head east, toward Dallas Parkway / Tollway.

Turn left into the North parking garage, which is on the West side of the International Plaza buildings. The entrance to the garage is just before the skybridge that connects two buildings.

Parking Information

Park in the North parking garage, which is on the West side of the International Plaza buildings and behind building II. The entrance to the garage is near the skybridge that connects two buildings.
